TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataSourceSelectArguments extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一种机制，数据绑定控件可使用这种机制向数据源控件请求在检索数据之后执行与数据相关的操作。

span.span: Provides a mechanism that data-bound controls use to request data-related operations from data source controls when data is retrieved.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件使用类请求数据源控件执行结果集，例如对数据进行排序或返回数据的特定子集的其他相关的数据操作。Data-bound controls use the class to request that a data source control performs additional data-related operations on a result set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data. 这些与数据相关的操作都用枚举枚举。These data-related operations are enumerated by the enumeration. 下表指示了类支持这些与数据相关的操作。The following table indicates how the class supports these data-related operations. |功能Capability|相关的 DataSourceSelectArguments 属性Related DataSourceSelectArguments properties| |----------------|--------------------------------------------------| ||| ||, , | ||, , | 数据绑定控件显式调用方法来绑定数据，调用与之关联的数据源控件的方法。Data-bound controls explicitly call the method to bind data, which calls the method of the data source control they are associated with. 这样一来，数据绑定控件从数据源控件按需检索数据。In this way, the data-bound control retrieves data from the data source control on demand. 因为方法接受参数的数据绑定控件是负责创建和管理对象并将其传递给方法从数据源控件检索数据时。Because the method accepts a parameter, the data-bound control is responsible for creating and managing a object and passing it to the method when it retrieves data from the data source control. 在某些情况下，数据绑定控件可能不需要任何其他数据相关的功能。In some cases, data-bound controls might not need any additional data-related capabilities. 在这种情况下，数据绑定控件传递自变量对象传递给方法。In this case, data-bound controls pass an arguments object to the method. 对于已排序的结果集，数据绑定控件检查数据源视图属性在运行时间，并添加功能使用方法。For sorted result sets, data-bound controls check a data source view's property at run time, and add a capability using the method. 数据绑定控件可以作为单独的操作，请求的已排序的结果集数据源控件通过设置上的属性对象传递给方法。As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a sorted result set from a data source control by setting the property on the object passed to the method. 数据绑定控件的分页情况下，检查数据源视图属性在运行时间，并添加功能使用方法。For paging scenarios, data-bound controls check a data source view's property at run time, and add a capability using the method. 作为一个单独的操作，数据绑定控件可以请求数据的子集从数据源控件进行分页通过设置并上的属性对象传递给方法。As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a subset of data from a data source control for paging by setting the and properties on the object passed to the method. 若要检索的总行数为分页方案，数据绑定控件，请检查数据源视图属性在运行时间，并添加功能使用方法。To retrieve a total row count for paging scenarios, data-bound controls check a data source view's property at run time, and add a capability using the method. 作为一个单独的操作，数据绑定控件可以请求总的行计数从数据源控件进行分页通过设置上的属性对象传递给方法。As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a total row count from a data source control for paging by setting the property on the object passed to the method. 当方法返回时，包含总计行计数属性。When the method returns, the total row count is contained by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果任一设置的属性，但在当前绑定的数据源控件不支持请求的功能时将引发异常调用方法。If any of the properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an exception is thrown when the method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddSupportedCapabilities(valuetype System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities capabilities) cil managed

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 向 实例添加一个功能，用于对支持的功能和请求的功能进行比较。

span.span: Adds one capability to the instance, which is used to compare supported capabilities and requested capabilities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据源控件调用方法为每个数据源支持的功能。Data source controls call the method for each capability the data source supports. 在添加功能后，任何调用到方法比较与请求的功能支持的功能 (通过设置表示， ， ，和属性)。After the capabilities are added, any call to the method compares the supported capabilities against the requested capabilities (represented by setting the , , , and properties). 例如，如果如功能未添加，但属性设置，方法，则会引发异常。For example, if a capability such as is not added but the property is set, the method throws a exception.

A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该属性返回使用默认值创建的对象构造函数。The property returns a object created with the default constructor. 可以使用属性时要调用没有任何附加参数的数据源视图类的方法。You can use the property when you want to call the method of a data source view class without any additional arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将重写方法使用的对象的各种属性的相等性测试。The class overrides the method to test equality using the various properties of the objects. 如果， ， ， ，并属性是在值均相等方法将返回`true`。If the , , , , and properties are all equal in value, the method returns `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaximumRows { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaximumRows : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示在一次数据检索操作中，数据源控件返回的最大数据行数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the maximum number of data rows that a data source control returns for a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 在一次数据检索操作中，数据源返回的最大数据行数。

span.span: The maximum number of data rows that a data source returns for a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 默认值为 0，指示返回所有可能的数据行。

span.span: The default value is 0, which indicates that all possible data rows are returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性支持分页方案。The property supports paging scenarios. 数据绑定控件检查数据源视图属性在运行时间，并添加功能使用方法如果视图支持分页。Data-bound controls check a data source view's property at run time, and add a capability using the method if the view supports paging. 如果数据绑定控件无法添加该功能，并在设置了分页属性在数据检索操作中，传递到数据源视图对象可能会引发异常。If the data-bound control fails to add the capability, and the paging properties are set on a object passed to the data source view during a data retrieval operation, an exception might be thrown. 数据绑定控件可以通过设置从数据源控件进行分页请求数据的子集并上的属性对象传递给方法。The data-bound control can request a subset of data from a data source control for paging by setting the and properties on the object passed to the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果任一设置的属性，但在当前绑定的数据源控件不支持请求的功能时将引发异常调用方法。If any of the properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an exception is thrown when the method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError(class System.Web.UI.DataSourceView view) cil managed

param.name: view
param.span: 执行数据检索操作的数据源视图。

span.span: The data source view that performs the data retrieval operation.

summary.span: 将为 操作请求的功能与指定的数据源视图所支持的功能进行比较。

span.span: Compares the capabilities requested for an operation against those that the specified data source view supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件使用方法进行比较的属性所表示的其他请求的功能类，例如想要进行排序或分页结果集，使用的数据支持的功能源视图。The method is used by data-bound controls to compare additional requested capabilities represented by the properties of the class, such as the ability to sort or page through a result set, with the capabilities supported by the data source view. 视图将调用其自身方法中定义每个可能功能枚举。The view calls its own method for each possible capability defined in the enumeration. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果任一设置的属性，但在当前绑定的数据源控件不支持请求的功能时将引发异常调用方法。If any of the properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an exception is thrown when the method is called.

exception.span: 数据源视图不支持指定的数据源功能。

span.span: The data source view does not support the data source capability specified.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RetrieveTotalRowCount { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RetrieveTotalRowCount : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在数据检索操作过程中，数据源控件是否应检索所有数据行的计数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a data source control should retrieve a count of all the data rows during a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 如果数据源控件应检索数据行总数，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the data source control should retrieve a total data row count; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性支持分页方案。The property supports paging scenarios. 将此属性设置为`true`数据检索操作期间从数据源控件请求的总行数。Set this property to `true` to request a total row count from the data source control during the data-retrieval operation. 检查属性来确定数据源视图是否支持检索总的行计数。Check the property to determine whether a data source view supports retrieving a total row count. 如果数据源支持属性设置的数据源控件的数据检索操作过程和中返回的总数据行计数数量为一个值，则返回输出参数的属性，方法。If the data source supports it, the property is set by the data source control during the course of a data retrieval operation and the total data row count is returned in the property, much as a value is returned in an output parameter of a method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果任一设置的属性，但在当前绑定的数据源控件不支持请求的功能时将引发异常调用方法。If any of the properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an exception is thrown when the method is called.

member this.SortExpression : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个表达式，数据源视图使用该表达式对 方法检索的数据进行排序。

span.span: Gets or sets an expression that the data source view uses to sort the data retrieved by the method.

value.span: 一个字符串，数据源视图使用该字符串对 方法检索的数据进行排序。

span.span: A string that the data source view uses to sort data retrieved by the method.

value.span: 如果未设置排序表达式，则返回 。

span.span: is returned if sort expression has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性支持排序方案。The property supports sorting scenarios.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示在数据检索操作过程中，检索数据行时数据源控件应使用的起始位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the starting position the data source control should use when retrieving data rows during a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 数据源控件检索数据的起始行位置。

span.span: The starting row position from which a data source control retrieves data.

value.span: 默认值为 0，指示起始位置为结果集的开始处。

span.span: The default value is 0, which indicates that the starting position is the beginning of the result set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性支持分页方案。The property supports paging scenarios. 数据绑定控件检查数据源视图属性在运行时间，并添加功能使用方法如果视图支持分页。Data-bound controls check a data source view's property at run time, and add a capability using the method if the view supports paging. 如果数据绑定控件无法添加该功能，并在设置了分页属性在数据检索操作中，传递到数据源视图对象可能会引发异常。If the data-bound control fails to add the capability, and the paging properties are set on a object passed to the data source view during a data retrieval operation, an exception might be thrown. 作为一个单独的操作，数据绑定控件可以请求数据的子集从数据源控件通过设置并上的属性对象传递给方法。As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a subset of data from a data source control by setting the and properties on the object passed to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int TotalRowCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.TotalRowCount : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置在数据检索操作过程中检索的行数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows retrieved during a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 数据检索操作检索的数据行总数。

span.span: The total number of data rows retrieved by the data retrieval operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性支持分页方案。The property supports paging scenarios. 数据源和数据源视图控件的有关如何检索总计行计数其内部实现方式不同。Data source and data source view controls differ in their internal implementation for how to retrieve total row counts. 检查属性来确定数据源视图是否支持在数据检索操作过程中检索的总行数。Check the property to determine whether a data source view supports retrieving a total row count during a data-retrieval operation. 如果数据源支持属性的数据源控件设置过程中一次数据检索操作，并在中返回的总数据行计数数量为一个值，则返回输出参数的属性，方法。If the data source supports it, the property is set by the data source control during the course of a data-retrieval operation, and the total data row count is returned in the property, much as a value is returned in an output parameter of a method.
